## Related Issues

## Review Checklist (Author)

### PR Hygiene
- [ ] PR title follows `type(scope): description`
- [ ] PR is focused and reasonably sized
- [ ] No unrelated changes are bundled

### Code Quality
- [ ] Lint passes
- [ ] Build passes
- [ ] No unresolved `TODO`/`FIXME` added
- [ ] No debug logs or debugger statements

### Type and Security
- [ ] No unjustified `any`
- [ ] Tenant/data boundary checks preserved (if applicable)
- [ ] No secrets committed
- [ ] Threat model completed for high-risk changes (auth, tenant data, external integrations)
- [ ] Security review report completed for major/high-risk changes (`docs/06-quality/security-review-report-template.md`)
- [ ] Deferred security items recorded in `docs/07-devops/security-exception-register.md` (if any)

### Docs and Governance
- [ ] Relevant docs updated under `docs/` if behavior/scope changed
- [ ] Decision logged in `docs/02-planning/decision-log.md` for major trade-offs
